heisigStory: A walking stick is needed for days of olden times, since days, too, get old - at least insofar as we refer to them as the "good old days." The main thing here is to think of "good old days" when you hear the key word olden times. The rest will take care of itself.
koohiiStory2: The old man with a walking stick kept talking of olden times all day long.
myStory: thời trước. xa xưa. thời 18 là thời xa xưa
words:
旧知(きゅうち): old friend, old friendship
旧事(くじ): past events, bygones
復旧(ふくきゅう): restoration, restitution, rehabilitation
旧(きゅう): ex-
